author: stevel
msg: and keeping the new stuff out the build. Glen wants me to rename servlet something else, like httptests, but I am trying to think of a good name, webapptests, maybe. Meanwhile, this patch stops the stuff from breaking gump

author: dims
msg: - Fix bug found when running TCK (Flush ONLY once when not doing HTTP 1.1 chunking).

author: gdaniels
msg: Fix problem with dealing with the default ("") actor in SOAP 1.1 for headers.
* Attempt to ensure that every SOAPService is connected to an
AxisEngine.  Then when we ask the service for its actor URIs, we get
a merged list of the Service actors and the Engine actors.
* Make the "" actor accepted by default.  Later we might have an
"intermediary" switch which you turn on to switch this off.

author: dims
msg: - Fix getQualifiedName (in PrefixedQName) as per SAAJ Spec
